doc:
Craig Stevens (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Craig_Stevens_(actor) 0 Craig Stevens (born Gail Shikles Jr.; July 8, 1918 – May 10, 2000) was an American film and television actor, best known for his starring role on television as private detective Peter Gunn from 1958 to 1961. Craig_Stevens ( born_Gail_Shikles_Jr. ; July_8_,_1918 – May_10_,_2000 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor , best_known for his_starring_role on television as private_detective_Peter_Gunn from 1958 to 1961 .
